channel.description: The latest CVEs for POSIMYTH -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35709|2024-06-08T14:03:10.796Z -- posimyth -- the%20plus%20addons%20for%20elementor%20page%20builder%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite: from n/a through 5.5.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-30435|2024-03-29T17:26:31.943Z -- posimyth -- the%20plus%20blocks%20for%20block%20editor%20%7C%20gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg: from n/a through 3.2.5.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects The Plus Blocks for Block Editor | Gutenberg: from n/a through 3.2.5.
